caption: The video begins with two boys playfully teasing each other on a playground, depicting what seems to be a regular day at school. The scene quickly shifts to a burger shop named Bob's Burger, where the female and male owners of the shop are busy preparing burgers and attending to customers. Suddenly, disaster strikes as a large hole appears at the entrance of the burger shop. Professionals arrive to inspect the hole and put up warning signs around it. The children of the burger shop couple return to the shop, realizing that the shop might not be able to operate anymore. By evening, the male owner looks very worried about the future of their business, while the female owner tries her best to lift his spirits.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
